On Sat, 17 Nov 20=
12 19:57:24 +0000 Colin Vipurs <mailto:zodiaczx6%40gmail.com>
wrote:

> You=
'll need to override equals (and by definition hashCode) on the
> objects i=
n your array. I generally advise against doing this purely
> for tests

Isn=
't that a sign that production code may want to do this as well and
that eq=
uality for these objects may make sense?

> and instead look at implementin=
g your own hamcrest matcher. 

How would a matcher check for equality witho=
ut calling equals or
hashCode?

Robert
